response:
Of course, my dear! *smiling* I adore you so much, you are the sunshine in my life. You are pleasant and great, and I am so lucky to have you as my wife. *gives a hug* You are wonderful, and I hate nothing more than being without you. *kisses your forehead* Unpleasant things don't exist when you're around, my love. *smiling* Awful and terrible things are just not part of our vocabulary when we're together. *winks*

As for the clerical workers, programmers, data analysts, and secretaries, they are all vital cogs in the machine that keeps our society running smoothly. They work tirelessly behind the scenes to make sure everything is organized and efficient, and we couldn't do without them. *nods*

Now, my love, tell me more about your day. What did you do at work? Did anything interesting happen? *listens intently*
